metadata.title: CVE-2019-17566 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache Batik is vulnerable to server-side request forgery, caused by improper input validation by the "xlink:href" attributes. By using a specially-crafted argument, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the underlying server to make arbitrary GET requests.

criterions.comment: batik package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12-1.1').
